website_summaries.verdict: One of the lowest-priced BEARPAW styles, the Emma Short boot is well-made, stylish, and sturdy.
pros: Customers praise the rich colors, fit, and attractive look of these boots
some owners have had theirs for years
Comfortable and easy to put on and take off
cons: some report too-small fit while others report too-big fit

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the shoe hardly 5 times. See the picture for it’s condition (left and right shoes). I realized this after walking into my office on a cold day. I am not expecting them to last long for the price of the product but I am not expecting cloth and rubber glued and send out either.
customer_reviews.author: Sowmya Bhimanadhuni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I always have a pair of these come winter! When I was 13 or 14 I would always buy a size up and be surprised when I got holes in the bottom of them four months later. This is because over time the fur on the inside of the boot wears down over time and the boot would slide off my heel a little and scrape the floor when I walked. That being said, buy the size you would typically buy, if it is snug that is good! Since I stayed true to my size these boots have lasted more than one cold season. Comfortable, cute, and go with any pant. Love, love, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Koda

customer_reviews.title: Look better than UGGS to me
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 and ordered a 10 after reading that they run true to size. My toes are right at the end of the boot. They are not cramped but I have no room to spare after regular sports socks. The quality seems fine so far and I prefer them over the 2 pairs of Uggs I have. My UGGS make my feet look long, these do not. Just ordered another pair in a 10. These look better on my feet than UGGS. I don't have to have the name UGGS just to say I do.
customer_reviews.author: Precious Jordan

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW...VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 11/13/17. Purchased 9/6/17. My second time wearing these boots and they randomly fell apart. This is very unacceptable! Should’ve just purchased a reliable pair of UGGS smh
customer_reviews.author: R.williams

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!! Knock offs!! No warranty just buy from bearpaw
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect until my feet started getting wet..... cracks in the soles on both shoes!!! I haven’t owned them a year and I didn’t ven use them during spring/summer! I’ve only worn them for a total of 4 months I honestly think these are knock offs not cool I could have bought from bear paw website and actually be covered under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kuzma

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bearpaw boots are 100% Z-best. I love them and I own three pair black, gray and purple. I ordered what I thought was a "wine" pair according to Amazon's bright n vivid ad description. What I received looked nothing like what I saw in the ad nor what I had expected. They look like a faded, dull...almost pastel prune color. Nothing close to wine at all I.was beyond disappointed. I am most definitely returning them asap. No problem at all with the three that I own and purchased from Zulily.
customer_reviews.author: mimi KAT

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy Boots
customer_reviews.text: Went on a visit to Niagra Falls in the winter surrounded by pure ice and these shoes kept my feet warm and toasty the entire time. I normally wear a size 10 in regular shoes ans sneakers and i noticed that most people said that these boots fit as expected, so i ordered a size 10. PERFECT FIT. They were extremely comfortable and warm. i was very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend these boots to anyone for snow and extremely cold weather. If you're planning on wearing them with footed tights just be sure to wear socks with them as the inside may become irritating to the heel area after prolonged walking with tights alone.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: the information is incorrect. It is not suede
customer_reviews.text: The information in the description is not correct. I've ordered these boots and wanted to get suede boots,as it's noticed in the description. But I was wonder why the suede is so smooth and I've found that there is faux leather upper what is noticed inside the boot I've got.I am very disappointed bec of that. And run somewhat small.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Nice, well-made boots, but run about 1 size small
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for some warm, well-made, true purple boots for Mardi Gras parades, and these fit the bill perfectly. However, I usually wear a size 8 and sized up to a 9 after reading reviews, and I am SO GLAD I did. Even the size 9 just barely fits with thin boot socks. Keep in mind that I can often get away with a size 7.5 in sandals, and usually wear size 8 or sometimes 8.5 in closed-toe shoes. I heartily recommend these, as long as you size up!
customer_reviews.author: Sharman L. Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Soles fell apart in 2 minutes. Could'nt believe it.
customer_reviews.text: These boots were the color I wanted. when I decided to wear them a few days later, the soles fell apart with cracking sounds. I should have read reviews. My daughter has several real bear paws, and the soles are real rubber not plastic and slick. Very bad experience, the shoes I buy from Amazon only have to be returned when too big or small. i had to give it a star to post a rating otherwise it would be 0
customer_reviews.author: tory

customer_reviews.title: Like many boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots in the olive in a size 7. Like many boots, it was a challenge to get them on. Once they are on they are the most comfortable boot I have ever worn. I even leave them on in the house. I made one mistake. I wore them as soon as I got them. I was cooking and spilled something on the right boot. Nothing I tried seemed to get the stain out. Then someone told me to use the eraser of a pencil which low and behold got the stain out. We bought the suede protector. Don't wear them until you have sprayed them. They are too nice to ruin.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie D. Weidhaas

customer_reviews.title: My Ukala boot are much better
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these because they remained me of a pair I purchased while visiting my sister several years ago, Ukala, and I’ve worn them even in the summer inside the house because I’ve always been cold natured lol. BUT these are NOTHING like what I was expecting. Opening is narrow then more so towards the foot. Once my foot was inside, bottom part was comfortable but that’s ALL that was. I actually thought I would have to ask for help out of the darn thing. Was so disappointed. If this helps anyone my boot size is an 8. 140lbs and 5’8” Much better luck to y’all out there
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had purchased my BEARPAWS sooner! I love them!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! These boots are so comfortable and affordable! I read all of the reviews and hoped that I was making the right decision on the size. I purchased the Bearpaw Women's Emma Short Snow Boots in a size 8.5, which is what I wear normally, with an occasional up-size to size 9. The Care & Fit card that came with them stated, "We recommend an initial tight fit in our suede/sheepskin footwear. Over time the suede will stretch slightly and the sheepskin will mold to your foot, making it the perfect fit." Initially, they were a tad snug but still very comfortable. Now after weeks of wearing them, they are perfect and sooooo warm! I will definitely purchase Bearpaws again!
customer_reviews.author: Julie P.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these......but....
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes.....BUT I wish I didn't have to buy a new pair EVERY year for the last 3 years, due to bottom soles cracking and seeping in rain or snow AND the inside heel padding wearing away to barely nothing. I will admit that I wear them daily during winter months, but I definitely am not over active in them. I also treat the outside with a protectant spray prior to wearing them. I'll continue to buy and wear them yearly though, because they're very warm and comfortable (especially in the beginning).
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W

customer_reviews.title: I returned and ordered a size up.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 9 in almost all shoes, but the 9 was too short with my toes hitting the end. The 10 is a little big, but very comfortable. I can wear thick socks in them. They are warm. I have found that different Bearpaw boots are sized differently. I have a different pair in a size 8 that fit well, and yet these are a size 10 and are comfortable. I do reccomend them, but suggest checking the exchange or return policy so you get the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these on Amazon once, but I have been buying them in store for the last ten years. Bearpaw is my favorite brand. They're super cute, comfy and warm, and they look like UGGs without the over expensiveness. I would say I have to buy a new pair every 2-3 years at least, depending on how much I've worn them. But I keep buying them because I know what I'm getting with them, it's a good product considering the price. I usually wear a size 9.5 but these loosen up a bit once you wear them in so I buy a half size down, that's just me though! Also, I suggest water proofing them! They'll look nice longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: You get the Ugg look for a non-Ugg price. These boots are very comfortable. I recommend treating them before wearing them, and as needed. For anyone who says they are tight, the instructions say that is the way they should be. They will stretch out as you wear them. Just break them in and they will be fine. I have these in 2 colors and I have 2 more in my saved list.
customer_reviews.author: slt165

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Great quality for the amazing price. I will say I ordered a 10 based on other reviews where other people with 9.5 feet said they ordered a 10 and they liked the way they fit. The 10 was quite big on my 9.5 feet, even with socks. The lining is fluffy and will squash down as you wear them so you want them to be form fitting at first! Unless you have EE width feet or you dont like form fitting shoes..The return shipping was simple and free, so it made the size mistake a super easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: ShutUpAndTakeMy$

customer_reviews.title: I friggin LOOOVE these boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Im in love with bear paws!! They're so cute and warm and affordable! Screw UGGS!! What kind of idiot would spend $200+ on boots? Oh wait...murica. right anyway these are not cheap quality. They're just as good as uggs, same look, same materials! Suede outside and a wool blend inside so your feet will be warm and cozy, not sweaty. I wear mine without socks and it's like wearing fuzzy slippers! Not waterproof of course so definitely spray them with a suede boot protector. The color is fantastic! I love purple.
customer_reviews.author: yanabanana

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the sizing!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of these boots, they are my favorite by far!! This year I bought Congac. My only complaint is the sizing this year...I initially bought an 8 (my size) and was completely shocked that my foot could not fit, let alone felt like it was being suffocated on all sides!! I had to go a size up since they DO NOT make these in half sizes despite that fact they offer it online...please be aware of the sizing. Otherwise I love them!! Super comfy, soft, and warm for Chicago winters!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: wife loves them, she has two pairs. She can't tell between these & UGGs. Save $ buy bearpaw! A+
customer_reviews.text: if you don't want to pay for overpriced uggs, bearpaw are the next best thing hands down. My wife had a pair of uggs she spent like 80 bucks on and these are actually more comfortable and just as warm for less than half the price. dogs are great and all but definitely overpriced. You can hardly tell the difference and she's owned a couple pair of these Bear paws and they last forever and keep her feet just as warm. She can't tell a difference in comfort at all. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Faslane Tech

customer_reviews.title: I love my boots BUT
customer_reviews.text: I love bear paw boots. I own 6 pairs of them , BUUUT........ The last pair I got the rubber is falling off the bottoms and now feels like hard plastic . I can't take them back because it's already been over 6 months since I've had them . I'm just wondering how this happened to these boots and not my others ?
customer_reviews.author: Tara Rose Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Superb Ugg imitations.
customer_reviews.text: To any regular person, these are just like Uggs. I wanted a good imitation so I bought these for $40 and change. Soles are rubber, suede upper is unblemished and solidly sewn, wooly insides are thick and warm. I normally wear a 10 but bought these in a 9. They are tightish but will stretch out a little. I will not wear these with socks so you might want a larger size to wear with socks.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, warm, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Rugged sole, fur on the inside holds up well to daily wear in winter. There's hardly any visible wear on the rubber soles after 2 winters of daily wear (November - March). I treated with Ugg suede waterproofing spray and they stayed dry in the snow and did not get salt stains. In temps below 0* Fahrenheit, my toes did still get cold after a bit of time outside. At those temps I usually put on my foam Moon Boots haha!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good boots, quick wear
customer_reviews.text: I loved this boots till this year. I bought January 5th 2018. They came and i sprayed them with water proof stuff. I wore them from januray till march or so. Last FALL was toooo wet to wear them so i didn't. Then yesterday i pulled them out, sprayed them down and theyre completly soaked on inside. Im so upset. I just want a new pair, as these are my only boots, and i paid good money for them wore them for 3 months and no more and now im screwed!
customer_reviews.author: Kassidee

customer_reviews.title: These last forever
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots in 2015 and they have lasted through a few winters and very, very snowy/slushy seasons. They are SO WARM and they last through a lot. They are a bit tight. I wear a 6 in all shoes, but these were a tad snug. They ended up stretching because i wore cozy socks with them as well, but I would have gone up to a 6.5 right away. They last forever and are still good. A bit dirty but I'm really shocked at how these have held up. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute and comfy but they run small
customer_reviews.text: I'm exchanging these for a larger size these because they were too small, but I am definitely getting another pair. The camel color is so cute and comfortable and yummy. I love wearing these as house shoes. I usually wear a 6.5 or 7, but I ended up having to get a size 8 because I like to wear thicker socks with these. The 7's were surprisingly small.
customer_reviews.author: MSpill

customer_reviews.title: DIDNT LAST 4 MONTHS INDOOR WEAR ONLY!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sole cracked all the way across on one boot after 4 months. I bought these because I was tired of slippers that wore out every year. Somehow these were actually worse and didn’t even make it 6 months. They were only worn indoors in our house!!! I would happy to change my tune if I could get support to stand by their product and respond. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: J-Wood

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I cant rationalize spending hundreds of dollars on name brand boots like this. These keep my feet warm and are stylish. Only issue is they run small. I normally wear a 7.5 and ordered an 8 hoping to have a tiny bit if wiggle room due but they're a little snug. I'm hoping over time the material will give a little. Overall, very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected - these are great boots
customer_reviews.text: A well-made and attractive boot - the lining is soft and warm. Very happy with these boots! The fit was slightly smaller than hoped for, as I'd hoped to wear thick socks and bought a larger size. However, the lining inside makes up for this, as it is a soft and warm lining, and I have no need for thick socks. I could even put my bare feet into these boots and go out in the snow and they'd stay nice and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Another Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Slightly small fit, style and color as expected. I like the boots
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of these boots and they look nice. I ordered a size 8 which is what I normally wear and they were a bit small, j could have used a half size bigger. They were very stiff when I first put them on but after a few days and stretched out a bit and are more comfortable. This is my first pair of bear paw boots.. normally I wear uggs. I like them BUT I think I will go back to uggs after this. These boots just feel and look cheap in comparison and I don’t think they are going to hold I’ll as long as my uggs have.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable, true to size
customer_reviews.text: I normally were either an 8 or 8.5. Ordered the 8. They fit perfectly. I can wear thick or this socks, either work fine. I'm 5'4 and about 130 pounds so I'm not over skinny but I feel like the boots have a little too much room at the top. There is quite a gap between my calf and the boot. My legs are pretty tiny though so I'm sure it's me and not the boot. Just something to consider if you have thin calves. Very warm and comfortable! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable winter boots I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so warm and feel like walking on fluffy clouds of happiness. I wear them all the time and wish I had 10 pairs of them. I like that these are shorter and come just below the calf because I have large dancer calves. I owned a longer pair years ago and they were nice but tight on the calves so these were perfect. They have a nice, solid rubber sole on them so they aren't floppy like the booty slippers you see. They grip nicely on the bottom and don't slip as well. Highly recommend these fluffy boots of joy.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke G

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Uggs!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are all the quality of uggs with a much better price! As opposed to its competitor, they hold up better getting wet. The bottom is a rubber material instead of a foam material. Very durable! Keep my feet warm during cold days & snow! Never hurts to spray a protectant or “scotch guard” to assist in keeping them dry! They’re true to size. I have several pairs in multiple colors. I kind of prefer them over my ugg boots.
customer_reviews.author: JEANNIE S.

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of perpetually cold feet in the winter and ordered these as they came highly recommended. WOW!!! Wish I had ordered them months ago!. They are to be worn without socks, which I was leery of, worried my feet would still be cold. Nope, they stayed toasty warm, did not sweat, and the comfort was just beyond all expectations. I would recommend these to anyone sensitive to the cold. I am actually looking forward to next winter!!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Holton

customer_reviews.title: They run VERY small....had defect.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited for these boots for a Christmas present. She wore them once and complained that there was something stabbing her foot inside the boot. The truly sad part is the boots run really small and we started with a size 4 (this is her true size) and then returned for a 5 and they didn't fit, sw we went way up to a 7! The 7 fits, but defective and she has lost her desire to own another pair. Moving on.... :(
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Whitener

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: These are GORGEOUS. And they are so comfortable. I've had them on my wish list for quite some time and only just had the opportunity to spoil myself. I'm SO grateful I did! They fit amazingly well - I can wear with socks or without and they are comfortable for walking. A lot of these types of boots do not have any support, but I find these to be perfectly fine in that department. The purple color is rich and lovely. I couldn't have picked the color better myself.
customer_reviews.author: QueenEvil

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it runs small
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it runs small. I ordered a size 11 because I usually wear a 10 - 10.5 depending on the show. However, this was extremely tight on my foot and my toe was pressed up against the edge. I'm going to return for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Letra

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, warm and comfy, but bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to with these boots, they look great, fit great, and are warm and cozy. I thought, there is no reason to spend more on a different brand! But after 1.5 months of light wearing, as in wearing around the house and taking the dog on two short casual walks a day in them, both holes are cracked under the ball of the foot. So I'm very very disappointed. These won't even last the winter as December just started and already I can only wear them when the ground is dry only.
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Snake skin design looks better online
customer_reviews.text: I bought the snake skin pattern boots which actually don't look as good as they do online. From the picture I thought they'd be made from a similar material as the others, with a snake skin pattern sort of punched into the material and a slight sheen. Instead these look and feel almost plastic like in appearance. However, they do seem just as sturdy as other boots I've had from this company and for the price I paid (under $30), I'm pretty happy with them. These are great winter boots and I look forward to wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D

customer_reviews.title: Good boot for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wine Bearpaw boots to compare to Ugg boots. I found Bearpaw boots to be less comfortable. The quality of the sole isn’t as good and the amount of inside fur is less. Although, I would recommend trying Bearpaw boots because of the lower cost, especially if buying a color that you won’t wear as much. Overall, for the price they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Willam McFaun

customer_reviews.title: Teenage Granddaughter Lives in These!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage granddaughter had these in hickory last winter. She wore them to school, and just everywhere she went. They held up very well, and obviously she found them to be comfortable. She was a size 8 last year, and these were the right fit for her in a size 8. Now she is a size 8 1/2, and I ordered that size in black for her for Christmas. I know they will go well with the black jeans she has asked for, and probably everything else!
customer_reviews.author: Judy in the skies

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings.
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected and were well made. They are warm and comfortable. However, I ordered the olive color. The color I received did not match the picture at all. I expected them to have a green tone with the name being olive. However, the picture made them look more tan or brown. The boots I received were a dark, deep green. Very disappointed that the product did not match the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Seam is coming unraveled too soon
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these because they’re cute and so comfortable! I bought my real size and they fit great. However one of the seams is coming undone and I have only worn them a handful of times. Sucks! I inspected when I received them too, to look for things like this & didn’t see any issue. Just after a few wears noticed a string dangling and saw that it’s coming apart on outter seam.
customer_reviews.author: N. McGreevy

customer_reviews.title: Authentic?
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little ify on the authenticity of the boots I received. I've been buying Bearpaw for years now and the insides of these boots didn't look or feel the same as the others I've purchased in the past also the tag inside the boots are directly in the back center of the boot where all the others I've purchased in the past have been on the sides. They've always been a little tight until you break them in but this pair seem uncomfortably tighter. Either way I'm not too upset because of the price I paid for them. They're still nice boots even if a few things are "off"
customer_reviews.author: Kay Free

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Perfect for if your short and fluffy! Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful boots! Came in the bearpaw box, I ordered a size 11 because I know they run small and at the heel if you dont buy the correct size it'll be very uncomfortable. But! I love them! Chose the perfect size. And the top part isnt tight at all, I am 5'3" and a big girl, I was worried they would not fit. But there is plenty of room! Honestly they're beautiful, comfy and I cant wait to wear them out in this weather!
customer_reviews.author: Mikala

customer_reviews.title: Warm but not consistent.
customer_reviews.text: I originally got a size 8 and had to return them for a size 8.5. The material on the size 8 was a softer cloth, but the material that came on the size 8.5 was a shinier leather-ish material even though I ordered the same thing. I had to go with it though because I needed them for a trip and was out of time. Other than the consistency in what you get being off, they’re warm. I’d say they run small because I am normally an 8.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Live these boots but after a year they are bubbling and about to peel. Not happy after spending so much in them and only wearing them last winter.
customer_reviews.author: Cami M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots, but shouldn't have ordered up a size
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots, but after reading the reviews I ordered a bigger size, which was a mistake. I normally wear 7-7.5, and definitely need a 7 in these. I have one other pair of bearpaws in size 7, but so many reviewers thought these ran small that I decided to try an 8. They were way too big, probably even with socks. But I do wear my bearpaws without socks, so I should have taken that into consideration! Like I said, though, I love these boots. The style and color are perfect and I know I'll wear them a ton once I get my size 7's! Update: The 7's are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: H. Olds

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Authentic
customer_reviews.text: These run big by about 1 full size (I usually wear an 8 in boots and buy these in a 7). They only last about 1 year, but I know that going in so not a big deal to me, others may not like that so much. They also stretch out over the year, hence the 4 star rating instead of 5
customer_reviews.author: Melissa T.

customer_reviews.title: Right boot fits and left slips off
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these boots at least once a year around this time. Every year I have been pleased with the purchase. However for some reason, this year, the left boot keeps slipping off. Will try to re-order but the price jumped from 45 to 64 in a span of a week or two. Actually disappointed in the fit and not willing to pay the price difference.
customer_reviews.author: Layla Preston

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw Womens Emma Short Snow Boots
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my boots! I needed some boots in a very light cream color and the camel color Bearpaws are perfect. I love the feel and look of the boots. I just got them yesterday, so I can't speak to how they will hold up... but I'm really hoping that they will be true to the brand and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Mom

customer_reviews.title: Try on in store BEFORE you buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom who wears a size 7 1/2. She could barely get her foot in it, so I tried it on myself thinking it’s her Alzheimer’s fogging up her mind. WRONG! I could barely get my foot in it either. I decided against returning the boots so I could offer them to my step-daughter who wears a size 7, but NO! She couldn’t wear them either. What the heck, Bearpaw? I thought this was a decent brand. Sending them back tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Indiana shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable absolutely love them! If questioning size I would recommend following their size chart and just measure your foot whether you wear a half size or not rather than following the reviews. Some swear you need to go up a size and others swear by going down a size. In my case I usually wear a 6.5 and even after measuring my foot I ordered both a 6 and a 7 to be safe and the 6 is what fit me best (just like the measurement told me) the 7 was way too big.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: I bought this pair of boots/house shoes in the middle ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of boots/house shoes in the middle of September of this year (2017) it is now the middle of December and there is a HUGE hole in the side of one of them. The sole of the shoe can be seen and the inner lining is coming out. Also, I wear these every day. I work from home and they are my go to shoes for around the house. Within 1-2 months the inner lining was nothing. It had wore down and fell out. But never did I expect to have hole in the side within 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Love BEARPAW
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and was exactly as described. My teen daughter loved them. The short hit slightly below mid calf. They do not hit at the ankle, so were super cute on her. I have a pair in black and the mid length. We get a lot of wear of our this brand before having to buy new. This pair was for fashion reasons...the short Grey is all the rage currently with her age group. It was to not to replace her other pair (brown mid calf) that is two yrs old. Her old one's are still in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Fussybutt01

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I order these boots about every two years... normally they last me that long. I don't know if the manufacturer has gotten cheap or what, but after a few wears the rubber on the bottom of the right shoe began to split, letting in any kind of moisture I walk on. Its ruined the inside of the shoe, and I can't wear them because it makes the bottom of my foot sore. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh Dotson

customer_reviews.title: False Hope :(
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with the positives. The boots arrived on time and looked just like the pictures online. They are comfortable and quickly became a favorite part of my causal attire. Sadly these boots are not well made. After about 20 wears the seams a several parts have started to rip. From the front the boots still look brand new but from the back they are ripped. I would love to repair them but also feel disappointed that even boots that cost less money from Payless have held up better than these. Regretfully I wouldn’t purchase again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Natalie S Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. This is my 5th pair of Bearpaw boots ...
customer_reviews.text: Boots arrived on 11/27/17. As of 1/5/2018 the rubber on the sole has broken on the outside left foot along the crease of the rubber. It is a 5 inch hole and the boots can not be worn anymore. I only wore them to and from work and did not do excessive outside walking in them. Very disappointed. This is my 5th pair of Bearpaw boots purchased for my family and myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to get on even standing and I have bad knees so usually have to sit to put on shoes. Very comfortable. Warm. Cute. This was my first pair of Bearpaws and they are comparable to Uggs which I have several pairs of. I am a 7 in Uggs and purchased a 7 in these and it was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: I love bear paw boots but I will say these are not comfortable 😑 I only wore them a hand full of times and the insole in them is non existence. So It feel like I’m walking on the ground . They are water resistant! A little rain here and there and they dried up pretty fast . Other than that I like the boots.
customer_reviews.author: cherrelle

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Bearpaw off and on since High school. I have a few Ugg purchases but honestly the differences in the two brands are small. I still love Ugg but for the price of Bearpaw its so worth it to purchase these shoes. I got the hunter green and I am really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: So super comfortable and very warm. They a eem to be good quality but I live in Florida so they won’t ever see snow or super harsh winter weather, I did use a water protectant on them though. Could probably wear without socks but I want them to stay nice, ordered my true size (7), they fit perfectly with any thickness socks, the plush lining just melts around your foot, even the bottom is comfy. And they’re cute.
customer_reviews.author: Iammegcee

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I bought. I bought 1 2 years ago and another pair last year because the first pair had holes in soles after a few months of wear. Now this last pair I bought have holes in the soles too. I tried to contact bear paw but they won’t answer. These should last me years, not months. Very upset!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle McInerney

customer_reviews.title: They'll have to pry them off my cold, dead feet.
customer_reviews.text: Bear Paw has definitely hit their stride. The workmanship is excellent, fit is perfect and there is just something about real sheep lining. I noticed that another person reviewing the item mentioned her concern about wearing these with no socks. Not to worry. I owned another pair of slippers with natural sheep lining and wore them for several years without socks and while I kept expecting them to get nasty, no such thing. I just wore them to death. When I went to replace them, I was shocked at the prices. Thank you, thank you BearPaw. Makes me feel special at a price I can afford. They have been on my feet every day since I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Bates

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, warm and room to siggle my toes.
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Uggs but they are too expensive for me these days, so I got these. They are snug and warm, my usual size is roomier than with Uggs. Very comfortable. Not sure the tread will be as good in the snow as Uggs, which look like more slip resistant tread. I will be using these for winter 4+ mile walks on snow and icy sidewalks. We will see! So far I really love them though.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Can't Live Without these Boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I needed a pair of boots I could throw on and not worry about. I usually buy UGGs and then worry that I am going to ruin them. I bought these as a no worry pair of boots and I love them. They are comfortable and have held up very well. I wear these daily in the winter and they have been perfect. I would highly recommend them. I will be repurchasing them again when this pair are no longer wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Five stars for warmth!
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for the warmth of these boots! Great construction and quality of materials (and color). I ordered a 7 even though I'm a 6.5 and the boots are still too tight but the packaging recommends to buy tighter shoes because the suede will stretch and form to your foot the more you wear them. Hopefully they stretch soon because it rubs my right heel pretty raw if I wear them for too long BUT I still think these will become my favorite shoes I own (especially for Midwest winter) so they still get five-stars! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: StephDFr

customer_reviews.title: Show these boots love, and they will last!
customer_reviews.text: These boots definitely fit a bit snug the first few times, until your feet get them broken in. I wouldn't recommend wearing super thick socks as it will be TOO snug. I've bought several pairs of these boots and as long as you take care of them they will last you forever. I think most of my pairs now have lasted 3 years minimum. You will want to put on some kind of water/stain repellent. I usually re-treat them with the spray every winter. Even with the protective spray, after being in the snow all day I do suggest to wipe off any salt that is remaining on the boots just to make sure they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: littleeeone

customer_reviews.title: Treat ypurself
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! The color is not black but more dark silver and as I got them on sale I'm extra pleased. They're a little stiff at first. After wearing them around the house they loosened up a good bit. They are not a suede so don't expect that. The material is kind of pleathery, which I like. They seem like they will repel water and be less likely to stain than the suede of other Bearpaws. I have big calves, about 17", and if these were any tighter they wouldn't work so keep that in mind. Especially since these are not the tall version. Overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P.Earl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and are extremely comfortable, warm and true to size. The only downside is they are a good 3 shades lighter than what i expected when I ordered. The grey looks like a dark charcoal but what I received is a very light grey. Not an end of the world issue by any means and I'm definitely keeping them since they're so comfortable. Just be aware the pics of the colors may be a little off!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My GF was trying to decide between UGGS and Bear Paw, after much research and deliberation the quality and price of the bear paw brand was simply unbeatable! She's had them for almost a year now and she absolutely loves them! She's worn them through rain, snow, and sleet and they have remained in great condition. Its that time of year again and she's pulled them out! I'd gladly purchase another pair! Great price. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Semper.fit

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: She loves them. Had to go one size up. Also bought a can of scotch guard for a few bucks rather than pay the extra $30 for water and weather treated ones. I’m sure the quality of the more expensive ones is superior to these, but these are not made cheaply and are great quality andcat the lower price.
customer_reviews.author: SeeDub8ch

customer_reviews.title: Walk on a Cloud
customer_reviews.text: 2017 Second pair. Still have first pair from 2016, they are just a little worn out and stained. SPRAY these boots. I recommend Sof Sole Ultra Protect Water Proofer. The boots from Amazon are a little darker than the ones in the stores. They are so comfortable and soft! 2018 Third pair. A little more snug than the first pair. I still like them and expect them to loosen up as I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Luv Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Bootie
customer_reviews.text: I live in Minnesota, and buy a new pair of these every other winter or so. They're definitely durable (and last longer than that), but I get so much use out of them. I wear them to work, out running errands, to the fish house, on walks in the winter time and they're fantastic. Grips are nice, and I don't see a lot of wear on the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: These are authentic and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical of these boots, due to some of the not-so-happy reviews I’ve seen on Amazon. However, I am pleasantly surprised! First off, I’m normally a 7.5. I bought a 7 and they fit me perfectly. I do not personally plan to wear thick socks with these since they’re already lined with fur, but I still could if I wanted, the fit would just be snug. If you plan to wear thick socks size up at least a half size. I have been contemplating Uggs for a few weeks but found these instead—I am very happy I went with with Bearpaw and not Ugg, and only paid $39 as opposed to $159!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Best product and service!
customer_reviews.text: The boots were bought as a gift and the recipient absolutely loves them. I bought them 1/2 size larger than her shoes and she said they fit perfectly with socks on and a Lil wiggle room. Super soft inside and toasty warm for the mornings that are cold now. Thank you for fast delivery and an excellent product. I'll order from this site again for future orders!
customer_reviews.author: beary

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm!
customer_reviews.text: So warm and comfortable! I would wear these everyday if I could! The only bad thing I have noticed so far is when I had something fall on the boot, and I grabbed a wet washcloth to wipe it off, the maroon color went onto the cloth. It didn’t fade the color in the boot, just bled onto the cloth. Overall, super happy with these and plan to buy more! I typically wear an 8.5, so I bought that size and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review to let others know how awesome these boots are!!! They are packaged very well and arrive in perfect condition!!! They are super comfy soft inside and feel good on your feet. You won't wanna take them off!!! You don't need to spend over 3 times your money on Uggs just for the name. These are way cooler!!! I got the chocolate and the color could not be more beautiful!!! I ordered the spray to protect them for the winter months. I would definitely recommend getting these!!! I love my Bearpaws!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tanya4176

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cute and comfortable boots!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on boots to get the cutest and warrmest for the winter, and these were beyond my expectations, they are extremely cute and comfortable. My size is usually between 7.5 and 8. I ordered the boot in size 7.5 and they fit perfectly well. Just that since the fur lining is thick, to have a little more loose fit to wear thick socks (that I dont think youre gonna need them), I would recommend ordering at least half size more than your usual fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Better than UGG!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a fan of bear paw forever! They’re quality boots that are affordable. In my opinion bear paws are better than UGGS. You get the same great quality at a fraction of the price. Make sure to get a water resistant/stain resistant treatment to treat them before wearing to ensure they last & Keep there great condition. Now my feet are thanking me! Super soft & warm. Couldn’t ask for a better Christmas gift to myself 💖
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for the price, but buy a size up.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in a timely manner and overall I'm happy with them. No tares, snags or rips. That being said, probably should order a half size to full size up from what you normally wear. I wear a womens size 6.5, I ordered a size 7 and I would probably be more comfortable with a size 7.5. I bought the charcoal color, and the color honestly doesn't look like the picture...almost looks like a dark navy blue to a dark purple depending on the lighting. Definitely wouldn't call them charcoal. Nevertheless, I'm keeping them for a comfy winter boot.
customer_reviews.author: Kim and Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered half a size smaller because we knew they would stretch some.. and they’re a perfect fit! First pain that came had a stitching error so we sent them back and the second pair is great. Return was incredibly quick and painless!! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: G:L Jewett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This Is the second time I purchased Bearpaws and I can they really live up to their standards. The colour that I got is really nice. The lining inside is perfect and it fits snug just how I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamille S.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pairs of Uggs and thought I would give Bearpaws a try. These are warm and are great for wearing around the house or running errands in the snow because I don't care if they get messed up due to the low price. However, as far as comfort/fit go, the Uggs are MUCH better. I might buy these again when my current pair wears out just because they are so inexpensive. Not bad overall, just not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: HollyJ521

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots in November of 2018 and after moderate use the back seam on one of the boots busted completely open. Note they were not tight either, I sized up. Very disappointed on the quality of these, I was hoping they’d last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Arrives as expected, just hard to get on foot
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly and as expected, after order was placed. My only complaint is, these boots are very difficult to put on, like to slide your foot in. The actual shoe size is fine once your foot is in, but it is a struggle to get it in. The ankle is made too narrow, I think. I’m hoping they will give a little, with time and wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Inside wore out after one season
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would order a pair of Bearpaw boots instead of ordering the less expensive Target brand every season. I was very disappointed to see that after one season of moderate use, the inside heel area is already totally worn through! The less expensive pairs that my daughters ordered from Amazon are actually holding up much better than Bearpaw. Will not be ordering Bearpaw again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Water soaked through bottom of boot
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots less than 2 months ago and I wear them quite often, I wore them outside today after it snowed and the snow was melting and my entire sock got soaked. Somehow water is getting into the bottom of the boot I checked and don’t see any cracks anywhere. I don’t know it would even get a crack, I would think these boots would last a lot longer than 2 months. This is the second pair I’ve ordered from here and the same thing happened with the other pair as well after having them for 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Very durable & look awesome, great quality & priced right!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Warm and cozy, all winter long! Clean them & Put them back in the box at the end of winter & pull them back out after summer & they still look brand new! Also I recommend spraying the suede protectant on them before first wear & they will stay brand new for years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, super comfy, super warm!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Super cute, super comfy, super warm! Ordered another pair in a different color because I liked them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Collins

customer_reviews.title: What’s wrong with these ???
customer_reviews.text: I give four stars because I just got them , size is right , color is right and shipping didn’t take too long ..... however if mine start to break down and crumble at the bottom I will be changing the rating . As of now I’ve worn twice . Edit : Only wore for a month , about one a week so total maybe four to five times and the bottom completely blew out on my right boot . Like the rubber just broke down and left a hole to which goes all the way to the inside . Do not buy !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these boots!! So soft, comfy and warm!! So spacious I wear a 9 and bought a 9.5 so glad I did!! Also I have wide calves and was worried about the fit well no worries they FIT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mo Mo

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is on
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear a size 9 and have a 16" calf. I ordered a 9 and they fit great, even with a square wide foot. I was worried about how they'd fit my calves, but there's no issue. They are however stiffer and bulkier than expected. I'm hoping with some wear they break down to the worn feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlee

customer_reviews.title: A must have...worth 10 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots have surprised me!!! I usually wear 10 but went 1 size up wasn't necessary!!! I took the advice of another reviewer to cover guard it best decision.Still look new after 2 snow storm!!! These boots are warm comfortable,water proof,snow safe,nonslip these are better than advertised!!! Love them, love them, if u like U**s but price is a prob..these surpass U**s!! I have weathered 2 snow storm since I bought these and look forward to the next one. Will be buying more in different colors. WELL DONE BEARPAW!!! THANK YOU!! LNathan
customer_reviews.author: LNathan

customer_reviews.title: To tight around the ankle
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my sister in law she could not fit her foot in. The ankle is way way to tight. I ended up trying them on and the same thing on me. My mom ended up trying them on and they fit... DEFFINITLY SMALL around the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: By samuel thompson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these for less than two months and they are falling apart. I am very disappointed because this is my second pair. The first I have had over a year and they are perfect still. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Aponte

customer_reviews.title: nice slippers but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice slippers. Well made. I usually wear a 9 and the 9 fit, but was a little shorter than I'd like--toes almost at the end of the slipper. No arch support. They are best used as indoor slippers!
customer_reviews.author: E. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cozy boots. These always get dirty; so I stopped buying the more expensive brand years ago. I think bear paws fit better anyway.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Cute cold weather boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute boots and neutral enough to go with lots of winter outfits. I was not expecting to like them as much as I do, but they fit well and truth be told they’re better than Uggs I’ve bought before. I highly recommend as I think for the price they are totally worth it!! I did purchase a suede protectant spray to put on them before wearing and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

product_meta.title: Bearpaw Women's Emma Short Snow Boot
product_meta.description:
This short-height women's boot by offers a style that's well paired with denim, a casual skirt, or country dress, with a ruggedly comfortable design ideal for kicking around town. the upper is made of soft suede for a natural look, and the boot€s luxuriously cozy lining provides increased cushioning and all-over comfort.

Bearpaw footwear combines comfort and contemporary style. Their footwear is made from quality materials that provide a natural beauty that's wearable year round.
feature_bullets: Classic pull-on boot in mid-height featuring pinched seaming and fur lining
